title: Zucchini Chickpea Fritters [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
directions: Add salt to grated zucchini-toss them well. Let it stay for 10 mins-squeeze the water out and add them to a salad bowl
Add mashed chickpeas, chickpea flour, brown rice flour, nutritional yeast, paprika, garlic, onion and mix them all.
Form patties and pan roast in coconut oil- Yummy fritters ready to eat :)
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas (rinsed, sautéed for 5 mins in a pan and then mashed with potato masher.)
2 Tbsp brown rice flour (more if it feels watery)
